content: I think I'll get the Kong Wobbler for Max. I've heard great things about it, and I'm sure he'll love the challenge of getting the treats out. By the way, speaking of treats, I've been using a new dental chew for Max to help with his teeth. The vet recommended them, and I've been giving him one every other day. Do you think that's a good frequency, or should I increase or decrease the frequency?
